ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Plintisssa walked to Dracona, thinking about what Ramhorn said, she decided that he can t do that to her because she was on their side and never did any

Plintisssa walked to Dracona, thinking about what Ramhorn said, she decided
that he can't do that to her because she was on their side and never did any
crimes. Dracona pointed to Panthyria.

"This is Panthyria, she's new around here!" Dracona said. Plintissa nodded.

"Hello, Panthyria, nice to see another GOOD Maximal make it to the planet,
because there's some pretty rotten ones here you have to watch out for.
First, Ramhorn, accuses people of killing when they did nothing, second,
Iron Raptor, sad to say but it's true, Iron Raptor became my friend and
dumped me as soon as she got a boyfriend, and third, Liono, the leader of
the Maximals, watch out for him, because Suukie took many shots for him and
he never thanked him and then he insulted me and my team, even after I
protected him he still insulted me!" Plintissa said to Panthyria. Plintissa
gasped and looked around, no Suukie in sight. Plintissa walked over and
grabbed the note off of Stronghold, who never ceased his card game.
Plintissa read it and found that Suukie was at the Predacon base to prove
himself because he had been a burden the time he was repairing.

"All right, troops! line up!" Plintissa ordered. Dracona walked into line,
and then Airbomber, then Stranato, then Train Wreck, then Arrow, and then,
with a little persuasion, Scamrock and Stronghold. Sinesis and Sinister came
walking up, looking angrier than ever before!

"Panthyria, you can help us if you wish to, we need help, we have to go to
the Pred base and battle the Predacons, Suukie is there and he's going to be
killed if we don't do anything, so lets MOVE IT!" Plintissa ordered. The
People's Group (I'm just going to call it the populists from now on, it's
easier.) turned into their Beast Modes. Plintissa sent a come right away
comm message to Wrath and Kamodia and The Populists were on their way to the
Pred base.

Suukie aproached the Predacon base and fired at the base insanely, not
thinking about his own welfare...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 12:43 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Ramhorn/Beachcomber/Smokescreen:
>
>
> Ramhorn looked to Plintissa.  "Apology not accepted.  I'll see you pay for
> your crimes justly." he said, looking to Smokescreen immediately after.
> "Come on, I'll show you to your quarters."
>
> "Alright..." Smokescreen said uncertain, following Ramhorn.  Stopping at a
> door, Ramhorn stepped close to it, the door sliding open.  "Here are your
> quarters." Ramhorn said, walking away.
>
> Smokescreen walked in, laying down on his recharge bed.
>
> ---------------
>
> Beachcomber, seeing Hiss and Breakdown, ran for the Ark, laser rifle
drawn.
> Pounding on the door and yelling, he waited.
>
